title: Patch Notes
content: Fevras' name. Fixed an unfinished sentence in the description of the Delicately Constructed Outfit. The Temporary Hit Points mentioned in the Armour of Agathys condition tooltip will now scale appropriately when upcast. Fixed several minor mismatches between subtitles in cinematics and the voice over. Fixed several typos across the game. Updated the text on the Crash Reporter screen in Brazilian Portuguese.
